title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Broadcasting payments in million GBP, with a total of 9 data points.
Overall Broadcasting payments in million GBP has increased over the Year.

Broadcasting payments in million GBP is roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2012/13, gradually increasing from 2012/13 to 2013/14, roughly constant from 2013/14 to 2015/16, gradually increasing from 2015/16 to 2016/17, and lastly roughly constant from 2016/17 to 2018/19.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015/16 and 2016/17.
Max Broadcasting payments in million GBP about 2456.01 was recorded at Year 2018/19
Min Broadcasting payments in million GBP about 953.0 was recorded at Year 2010/11
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Broadcasting payments in million GBP with a total of 9 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2018/19 to 2010/11.
